title: Activate Signal Request
description: Request parameters for activating a signal on a specific deployment target

signal_agent_segment_id.description: The universal identifier for the signal to activate

deployments.description: Target deployment(s) for activation. If the authenticated caller matches one of these deployment targets, activation keys will be included in the response.

pricing_option_id.description: The pricing option selected from the signal's pricing_options in the get_signals response. Required when the signal has pricing options. Records the buyer's pricing commitment at activation time and is referenced in subsequent report_usage calls.
